midwife during pregnancy

although this may change 
depending on your labour and 
birth. You are likely to need 
quite a lot of help and advice 
with	your	first	baby.	Whether	
you are in hospital or at home, 
the midwives are there to guide 
and support you as well as to 
check that you are recovering
